ITEM_DELETE_PROTECTION.Name: Item Delete protection
ITEM_DELETE_PROTECTION.Hint: Item Delete Protection helps to stop uninteded deletion of sub items

AUTOGENERATION_OPTIONS.Name: Item Autogeneration Options
AUTOGENERATION_OPTIONS.Hint: Options for how autogenerating is applied

PREFIX_PROPERTY.Name: Prefix for property key
PREFIX_PROPERTY.Hint: Used for autogenerating property key when Use property data type for prefix is unchecked

PREFIX_PROPERTY_SIMPLETEXT.Name: Prefix for simpletext property key
PREFIX_PROPERTY_SIMPLETEXT.Hint: Used for autogenerating property key when Use property data type for prefix is checked

PREFIX_PROPERTY_SIMPLENUMERIC.Name: Prefix for simplenumeric property key
PREFIX_PROPERTY_SIMPLENUMERIC.Hint: Used for autogenerating property key when Use property data type for prefix is checked

PREFIX_PROPERTY_CHECKBOX.Name: Prefix for checkbox property key
PREFIX_PROPERTY_CHECKBOX.Hint: Used for autogenerating property key when Use property data type for prefix is checked

PREFIX_PROPERTY_RADIO.Name: Prefix for radio property key
PREFIX_PROPERTY_RADIO.Hint: Used for autogenerating property key when Use property data type for prefix is checked

PREFIX_PROPERTY_TEXTAREA.Name: Prefix for textarea property key
PREFIX_PROPERTY_TEXTAREA.Hint: Used for autogenerating property key when Use property data type for prefix is checked

PREFIX_PROPERTY_LIST.Name: Prefix for list property key
PREFIX_PROPERTY_LIST.Hint: Used for autogenerating property key when Use property data type for prefix is checked

PREFIX_PROPERTY_LABEL.Name: Prefix for label property key
PREFIX_PROPERTY_LABEL.Hint: Used for autogenerating property key when Use property data type for prefix is checked

PREFIX_PROPERTY_BADGE.Name: Prefix for badge property key
PREFIX_PROPERTY_BADGE.Hint: Used for autogenerating property key when Use property data type for prefix is checked

PREFIX_PROPERTY_TABLE.Name: Prefix for property key
PREFIX_PROPERTY_TABLE.Hint: Used for autogenerating property key when Use property data type for prefix is checked

PREFIX_PROPERTY_BUTTON.Name: Prefix for button property key
PREFIX_PROPERTY_BUTTON.Hint: Used for autogenerating property key when Use property data type for prefix is checked

OPTION_ENFORCED_VALIDATION.Name: Enforced key validation mode
OPTION_ENFORCED_VALIDATION.Hint:
Unchecked: Sandbox standard - Keys are valid unless containing space, special characters or empty.
Keys for can be duplicate between datatypes except panels/multipanels
Checked: Enforced - Keys are valid if containing only A-Z, a-z,0-9,_(underscore) and not empty.
Keys can not be duplicate between datatypes

OPTION_CONFIRM_BATCH_OVERWRITE.Name: Confirm batch overwrite
OPTION_CONFIRM_BATCH_OVERWRITE.Hint: Ask user for confirmation before applying batch overwrite(Autogenerate All,Clear All)

OPTION_CONFIRM_ATTRIBUTE_OVERWRITE.Name: Confirm attribute overwrite
OPTION_CONFIRM_ATTRIBUTE_OVERWRITE.Hint: Ask user for confirmation before applying attribute overwrite(Autogenerate)

OPTION_AUTOGENERATE_PROPERTY_ICON.Name: Change property icon automatically
OPTION_AUTOGENERATE_PROPERTY_ICON.Hint: When enabled, changes to a property's datatype will automatically change the propertys icon

OPTION_SHOW_ITEM_HELPERS.Name: Show item helpers
OPTION_SHOW_ITEM_HELPERS.Hint:
Show item helper menus on item sheets.
Applies for GMs only.

OPTION_ACTIVATE_ITEM_DELETE_PROTECTION.Name: Activate item deletion protection
OPTION_ACTIVATE_ITEM_DELETE_PROTECTION.Hint: When activated, delete icons will be hidden as default, a checkbox for toggling the visibility of the delete icon is added to sheets window title.

OPTION_USE_DATATYPE_PREFIX.Name: Use property data type for prefix
OPTION_USE_DATATYPE_PREFIX.Hint: When autogenerating a property key, use the propertys data type for prefix

OPTION_USE_PREFIX_SUFFIX.Name: Use prefix/suffix for autogenerating
OPTION_USE_PREFIX_SUFFIX.Hint: When autogenerating a field, add prefix and suffix

OPTION_TRANSLITERATE_NON_LATIN.Name: Transliterate non-latin characters
OPTION_TRANSLITERATE_NON_LATIN.Hint:
When autogenerating key, any non-latin characters are transliterated into latin equivalents.
When Enforced key validation mode is checked, transliteration will be executed regardless of this setting.
Please note that using non-latin characters as key might not work in roll expressions

OPTION_SET_DEFAULT_ITEM_TAB.Name: Override item default tab
OPTION_SET_DEFAULT_ITEM_TAB.Hint:
When checked, the default(starting) tab when an item is displayed is Details or Attributes(for cItems).
Applies for GMs only.

OPTION_ADAPT_ITEM_SHEET_POSITION.Name: Adapt item sheet size/position
OPTION_ADAPT_ITEM_SHEET_POSITION.Hint:
When checked, the starting size and position are adapted to item content.
Applies for GMs only.

OPTION_DISPLAY_ID_IN_SHEET_CAPTION.Name: Display ID in sheet caption
OPTION_DISPLAY_ID_IN_SHEET_CAPTION.Hint:
When checked, the item/actors ID will be displayed as a tooltip icon in the sheets window title.
Clicking this icon will output the item/actor data in the console. Useful for debugging problems.
Applies for GMs only.

OPTION_DISPLAY_SHOW_TO_OTHERS_IN_SHEET_C.Name: Display Show To Others in sheet caption
OPTION_DISPLAY_SHOW_TO_OTHERS_IN_SHEET_C.Hint: When checked, the a clickable icon will be shown in the sheets window title.

OPTION_USE_CITEM_INFO_FORM_FOR_GMS.Name: Show GMs cItem description only
OPTION_USE_CITEM_INFO_FORM_FOR_GMS.Hint:
When checked, clicking a cItem link in a table or chat, only the data on the cItem Info-tab will be showed. No permissions on the cItems is needed.
Applies for GMs only.

OPTION_USE_CITEM_INFO_FORM_FOR_PLAYERS.Name: Show players cItem description only
OPTION_USE_CITEM_INFO_FORM_FOR_PLAYERS.Hint:
When checked, clicking a cItem link in a table or chat, only the data on the cItem Info-tab will be showed. No permissions on the cItems is needed.
Applies for players only.

SETTING_CITEM_ICON_SIZE.Name: cItem icon size
SETTING_CITEM_ICON_SIZE.Hint:
The size(in px) to display cItem icons in tables.
Default is 26. Set 0 to display the icon original size from image file.

OPTION_DISPLAY_SUBITEMS_ICONS.Name: Enable show subitem icons
OPTION_DISPLAY_SUBITEMS_ICONS.Hint: When checked, the icon for subitems will be displayed in subitem tables(properties in panel, panels in tabs, citems in cItem tab etc)
